extDescription.message: Lees de tekst van elk liedje op YouTube™, Last.fm™, Grooveshark™ en Google Play™, zonder vervelende Pop-ups!
Lesen Sie den Text zu jedem Song auf YouTube™, Last.fm™, Grooveshark™ und Google Play™, ohne ärgerlichen Pop-ups!

pageActionTitle.description: Text in small Pop-up when you hover the page action icon

loadingMessage.description: Message when a lyrics is loading

copyrightInfo.message: Die Lyrics sind Eigentum der jeweiligen Rechteinhaber.
copyrightInfo.description: First line of the copyright text after the lyrics

copyrightCourtesy.message: Die Lyrics sind Eigentum der LyricWiki
copyrightCourtesy.description: Second line of the copyright with a link to LyricsWiki

notFound.description: Message shown when no lyrics was found

notFoundHelp.message: Gebe die Titel und Künstler, oder eine Textzeile manuell ein:
notFoundHelp.description: Show a hint when searching for lyrics

searchHelp.message: Füllen Sie die Titel und Künstler, oder eine Textzeile, aus:
searchHelp.description: Show a hint when no lyrics were found

settingsLyrics.message: Wie wollen Sie die Texte haben?
settingsLyrics.description: Option of settings page: lyrics display

addToPage.description: Option 1: add lyrics to the page

openInNewTab.description: Option 2: open lyrics in a new tab page

inPopup.description: Option 3: open lyrics in a Pop-up

underConstruction.message: Note: These changes won't have any effect right now. This part of the plugin is still under construction. If you have some good ideas about improvements for this plugin, feel free to add a comment at the Google Webstore. Thanks!
underConstruction.description: Under construction message in the options page.

textSize.description: Change text size, top of the new tab page

openPinned.description: Do you want a pinned tab or a normal tab

openNormal.description: Do you want a pinned tab or a normal tab

find.description: Button text for the search button

broughtToYou.description: Message in the header in the new tab page

plusone_locale.description: Google Plus One can be translated by providing the right locale

flattr_locale.description: Flattr can be translated automatically by providing the right locale

changeLyrics.description: Message to change the current lyrics -- brings you to the search form

minimizeLyrics.description: Message to slide up or slide down the lyrics

largerText.description: Title attribute for larger text size

smallerText.description: Title attribute for smaller text size

omniboxHelp.description: Text when 'lyrics' is typed in the omnibox

tryThePopup.description: Is shown above the lyrics in some cases
